text:
Mostly cloudy early, then sunshine for the afternoon. High 42F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.. Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 28F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Updated: March 30, 2024 @ 8:30 am   FILE - A Copilot page showing the incorporation of AI technology is shown in London, Tuesday, Feb. 13, 2024. A Microsoft engineer is sounding an alarm Wednesday, March 6, 2024, about offensive and harmful imagery he says is too easily made by the company’s artificial intelligence image-generator tool. A Microsoft engineer is sounding alarms about offensive and harmful imagery he says is too easily made by the company's artificial intelligence image-generator tool, sending letters on Wednesday to U.S. regulators and the tech giant's board of directors urging them to take action. Shane Jones told The Associated Press that he considers himself a whistleblower and that he also met last month with U.S. Senate staffers to share his concerns.
